category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCIC_ignore_DT_for_LFC
preference.preference_description: TCIC_ignore_DT_for_LFC preference can be used to disable export of Design Table files during Load For Compare process True: Design Table files are not exported to LFC directory during Load For Compare process (Even if CATIA_manage_designtables preference is set to true) False: Design Table files are exported to LFC directory during Load For Compare process (Unless CATIA_manage_designtables preference is set to false)
